00028 #ifndef __MeshFileFormat_H__
00029 #define __MeshFileFormat_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00058     enum MeshChunkID {
00059         M_HEADER                = 0x1000,
00060             // char*          version           : Version number check
00061         M_MESH                = 0x3000,
00062             // bool skeletallyAnimated   // important flag which affects h/w buffer policies
00063             // Optional M_GEOMETRY chunk
00064             M_SUBMESH             = 0x4000, 
00065                 // char* materialName
00066                 // bool useSharedVertices
00067                 // unsigned int indexCount
00068                 // bool indexes32Bit
00069                 // unsigned int* faceVertexIndices (indexCount)
00070                 // OR
00071                 // unsigned short* faceVertexIndices (indexCount)
00072                 // M_GEOMETRY chunk (Optional: present only if useSharedVertices = false)
00073                 M_SUBMESH_OPERATION = 0x4010, // optional, trilist assumed if missing
00074                     // unsigned short operationType
00075                 M_SUBMESH_BONE_ASSIGNMENT = 0x4100,
00076                     // Optional bone weights (repeating section)
00077                     // unsigned int vertexIndex;
00078                     // unsigned short boneIndex;
00079                     // float weight;
00080                 // Optional chunk that matches a texture name to an alias
00081                 // a texture alias is sent to the submesh material to use this texture name
00082                 // instead of the one in the texture unit with a matching alias name
00083                 M_SUBMESH_TEXTURE_ALIAS = 0x4200, // Repeating section
00084                     // char* aliasName;
00085                     // char* textureName;
00086 
00087             M_GEOMETRY          = 0x5000, // NB this chunk is embedded within M_MESH and M_SUBMESH
00088                 // unsigned int vertexCount
00089                 M_GEOMETRY_VERTEX_DECLARATION = 0x5100,
00090                     M_GEOMETRY_VERTEX_ELEMENT = 0x5110, // Repeating section
00091                         // unsigned short source;   // buffer bind source
00092                         // unsigned short type;     // VertexElementType
00093                         // unsigned short semantic; // VertexElementSemantic
00094                         // unsigned short offset;   // start offset in buffer in bytes
00095                         // unsigned short index;    // index of the semantic (for colours and texture coords)
00096                 M_GEOMETRY_VERTEX_BUFFER = 0x5200, // Repeating section
00097                     // unsigned short bindIndex;    // Index to bind this buffer to
00098                     // unsigned short vertexSize;   // Per-vertex size, must agree with declaration at this index
00099                     M_GEOMETRY_VERTEX_BUFFER_DATA = 0x5210,
00100                         // raw buffer data
00101             M_MESH_SKELETON_LINK = 0x6000,
00102                 // Optional link to skeleton
00103                 // char* skeletonName           : name of .skeleton to use
00104             M_MESH_BONE_ASSIGNMENT = 0x7000,
00105                 // Optional bone weights (repeating section)
00106                 // unsigned int vertexIndex;
00107                 // unsigned short boneIndex;
00108                 // float weight;
00109             M_MESH_LOD = 0x8000,
00110                 // Optional LOD information
00111                 // string strategyName;
00112                 // unsigned short numLevels;
00113                 // bool manual;  (true for manual alternate meshes, false for generated)
00114                 M_MESH_LOD_USAGE = 0x8100,
00115                 // Repeating section, ordered in increasing depth
00116                 // NB LOD 0 (full detail from 0 depth) is omitted
00117                 // LOD value - this is a distance, a pixel count etc, based on strategy
00118                 // float lodValue;
00119                     M_MESH_LOD_MANUAL = 0x8110,
00120                     // Required if M_MESH_LOD section manual = true
00121                     // String manualMeshName;
00122                     M_MESH_LOD_GENERATED = 0x8120,
00123                     // Required if M_MESH_LOD section manual = false
00124                     // Repeating section (1 per submesh)
00125                     // unsigned int indexCount;
00126                     // bool indexes32Bit
00127                     // unsigned short* faceIndexes;  (indexCount)
00128                     // OR
00129                     // unsigned int* faceIndexes;  (indexCount)
00130             M_MESH_BOUNDS = 0x9000,
00131                 // float minx, miny, minz
00132                 // float maxx, maxy, maxz
00133                 // float radius
00134                     
00135             // Added By DrEvil
00136             // optional chunk that contains a table of submesh indexes and the names of
00137             // the sub-meshes.
00138             M_SUBMESH_NAME_TABLE = 0xA000,
00139                 // Subchunks of the name table. Each chunk contains an index & string
00140                 M_SUBMESH_NAME_TABLE_ELEMENT = 0xA100,
00141                     // short index
00142                     // char* name
00143             
00144             // Optional chunk which stores precomputed edge data                     
00145             M_EDGE_LISTS = 0xB000,
00146                 // Each LOD has a separate edge list
00147                 M_EDGE_LIST_LOD = 0xB100,
00148                     // unsigned short lodIndex
00149                     // bool isManual            // If manual, no edge data here, loaded from manual mesh
00150                         // bool isClosed
00151                         // unsigned long numTriangles
00152                         // unsigned long numEdgeGroups
00153                         // Triangle* triangleList
00154                             // unsigned long indexSet
00155                             // unsigned long vertexSet
00156                             // unsigned long vertIndex[3]
00157                             // unsigned long sharedVertIndex[3] 
00158                             // float normal[4] 
00159 
00160                         M_EDGE_GROUP = 0xB110,
00161                             // unsigned long vertexSet
00162                             // unsigned long triStart
00163                             // unsigned long triCount
00164                             // unsigned long numEdges
00165                             // Edge* edgeList
00166                                 // unsigned long  triIndex[2]
00167                                 // unsigned long  vertIndex[2]
00168                                 // unsigned long  sharedVertIndex[2]
00169                                 // bool degenerate
00170 
00171             // Optional poses section, referred to by pose keyframes
00172             M_POSES = 0xC000,
00173                 M_POSE = 0xC100,
00174                     // char* name (may be blank)
00175                     // unsigned short target    // 0 for shared geometry, 
00176                                                 // 1+ for submesh index + 1
00177                     M_POSE_VERTEX = 0xC111,
00178                         // unsigned long vertexIndex
00179                         // float xoffset, yoffset, zoffset
00180             // Optional vertex animation chunk
00181             M_ANIMATIONS = 0xD000, 
00182                 M_ANIMATION = 0xD100,
00183                 // char* name
00184                 // float length
00185                 M_ANIMATION_TRACK = 0xD110,
00186                     // unsigned short type          // 1 == morph, 2 == pose
00187                     // unsigned short target        // 0 for shared geometry, 
00188                                                     // 1+ for submesh index + 1
00189                     M_ANIMATION_MORPH_KEYFRAME = 0xD111,
00190                         // float time
00191                         // float x,y,z          // repeat by number of vertices in original geometry
00192                     M_ANIMATION_POSE_KEYFRAME = 0xD112,
00193                         // float time
00194                         M_ANIMATION_POSE_REF = 0xD113, // repeat for number of referenced poses
00195                             // unsigned short poseIndex 
00196                             // float influence
00197 
00198             // Optional submesh extreme vertex list chink
00199             M_TABLE_EXTREMES = 0xE000,
00200             // unsigned short submesh_index;
00201             // float extremes [n_extremes][3];
00202 
00203     /* Version 1.2 of the .mesh format (deprecated)
00204     enum MeshChunkID {
00205         M_HEADER                = 0x1000,
00206             // char*          version           : Version number check
00207         M_MESH                = 0x3000,
00208             // bool skeletallyAnimated   // important flag which affects h/w buffer policies
00209             // Optional M_GEOMETRY chunk
00210             M_SUBMESH             = 0x4000, 
00211                 // char* materialName
00212                 // bool useSharedVertices
00213                 // unsigned int indexCount
00214                 // bool indexes32Bit
00215                 // unsigned int* faceVertexIndices (indexCount)
00216                 // OR
00217                 // unsigned short* faceVertexIndices (indexCount)
00218                 // M_GEOMETRY chunk (Optional: present only if useSharedVertices = false)
00219                 M_SUBMESH_OPERATION = 0x4010, // optional, trilist assumed if missing
00220                     // unsigned short operationType
00221                 M_SUBMESH_BONE_ASSIGNMENT = 0x4100,
00222                     // Optional bone weights (repeating section)
00223                     // unsigned int vertexIndex;
00224                     // unsigned short boneIndex;
00225                     // float weight;
00226             M_GEOMETRY          = 0x5000, // NB this chunk is embedded within M_MESH and M_SUBMESH
00227             */
00228                 // unsigned int vertexCount
00229                 // float* pVertices (x, y, z order x numVertices)
00230                 M_GEOMETRY_NORMALS = 0x5100,    //(Optional)
00231                     // float* pNormals (x, y, z order x numVertices)
00232                 M_GEOMETRY_COLOURS = 0x5200,    //(Optional)
00233                     // unsigned long* pColours (RGBA 8888 format x numVertices)
00234                 M_GEOMETRY_TEXCOORDS = 0x5300    //(Optional, REPEATABLE, each one adds an extra set)
00235                     // unsigned short dimensions    (1 for 1D, 2 for 2D, 3 for 3D)
00236                     // float* pTexCoords  (u [v] [w] order, dimensions x numVertices)
00237             /*
00238             M_MESH_SKELETON_LINK = 0x6000,
00239                 // Optional link to skeleton
00240                 // char* skeletonName           : name of .skeleton to use
00241             M_MESH_BONE_ASSIGNMENT = 0x7000,
00242                 // Optional bone weights (repeating section)
00243                 // unsigned int vertexIndex;
00244                 // unsigned short boneIndex;
00245                 // float weight;
00246             M_MESH_LOD = 0x8000,
00247                 // Optional LOD information
00248                 // unsigned short numLevels;
00249                 // bool manual;  (true for manual alternate meshes, false for generated)
00250                 M_MESH_LOD_USAGE = 0x8100,
00251                 // Repeating section, ordered in increasing depth
00252                 // NB LOD 0 (full detail from 0 depth) is omitted
00253                 // float fromSquaredDepth;
00254                     M_MESH_LOD_MANUAL = 0x8110,
00255                     // Required if M_MESH_LOD section manual = true
00256                     // String manualMeshName;
00257                     M_MESH_LOD_GENERATED = 0x8120,
00258                     // Required if M_MESH_LOD section manual = false
00259                     // Repeating section (1 per submesh)
00260                     // unsigned int indexCount;
00261                     // bool indexes32Bit
00262                     // unsigned short* faceIndexes;  (indexCount)
00263                     // OR
00264                     // unsigned int* faceIndexes;  (indexCount)
00265             M_MESH_BOUNDS = 0x9000
00266                 // float minx, miny, minz
00267                 // float maxx, maxy, maxz
00268                 // float radius
00269 
00270             // Added By DrEvil
00271             // optional chunk that contains a table of submesh indexes and the names of
00272             // the sub-meshes.
00273             M_SUBMESH_NAME_TABLE,
00274                 // Subchunks of the name table. Each chunk contains an index & string
00275                 M_SUBMESH_NAME_TABLE_ELEMENT,
00276                     // short index
00277                     // char* name
00278 
00279     */
00280     };
